content.rendered:
**Veuillez noter que la plupart de ces ressources ne sont offertes qu’en anglais**

Naviguer par province: AB | BC | MB | NB | NFL | NS | ON | PEI | SK | YT | National

NATIONAL

Bienvenue au Canada- Ce que vous devriez savoir
Réalisé par Immigration, Réfugiés et Citoyenneté Canada

The Newcomer’s Guide to Canadian Housing
Produced by the Canadian Mortgage and Housing Corporation

Renting your first home in Canada: What newcomers need to know.
Produced by the Canadian Mortgage and Housing Corporation

Vous voulez travailler au Canada? Un guide essentiel pour les nouveaux arrivants.
Réalisé par Immigration, Réfugiés et Citoyenneté Canada

Haut de page

ALBERTA

Welcome to Alberta: Information for Newcomers
Produced by the Government of Alberta, 2010

Working in Alberta: A guide for internationally trained and educated immigrants
Produced by the Government of Alberta, Alberta Employment and Immigration, 2009

Edmonton Newcomers Guide
Produced by the City of Edmonton, 2010

Haut de page

COLOMBIE BRITANNIQUE

British Columbia Newcomers’ Guide to Resources and Services
Produced by the Government of British Columbia. This guide is also available in French, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Punjabi, Russian, Spanish, Arabic, Farsi (Persian), and Vietnamese.

A newcomer’s guide to the City of Vancouver
Produced by the City of Vancouver, 2002. This guide is also available in Chinese, Punjabi, Spanish, and Vietnamese.

Haut de page

MANITOBA

Living in Manitoba: A resource guide for immigrant women
Produced by the Government of Manitoba, Manitoba Status of Women Division

Welcome to Winnipeg and the community of Seven Oaks: A Newcomers Guide
Produced by the Neighbourhood Immigrant Settlement Worker of Seven Oaks, 2007

Haut de page

NOUVEAU BRUNSWICK

Orientation Guide for Newcomers to New Brunswick
Produced by the Government of New Brunswick

Quick Reference Guide for Permanent Residents to New Brunswick
Produced by the Government of New Brunswick

Guide for Newcomers: Welcome to Greater Moncton
Produced by the Greater Immigration Board

Haut de page

TERRE NEUVE & LABRADOR

Newcomer’s Guide to Services and Resources in Newfoundland and Labrador
Produced by the Association for New Canadians

Living in Newfoundland and Labrador: A Newcomers’ Pocket Guide
Produced by the Association for New Canadians

An Immigrant Parents’ Guide to the Newfoundland and Labrador School System
Produced by the Association for New Canadians

Also available in Albanian, Burmese, Nepalese, and Spanish here.

Haut de page

NOUVELLE ÉCOSSE

Newcomer’s Guide to Nova Scotia schools
Produced by the Halifax Regional School Board (HRSB) in partnership with the Nova Scotia Office of Immigration (NSOI).

Haut de page

ONTARIO

First Days Guide: A newcomers’ guide to their first two weeks in Ontario
Produced by Settlement.Org, 2009

Welcome to Ontario: A guide to programs and services for newcomers to Ontario
Produced by the Government of Ontario, 2009

Le guide des écoles élémentaires de l’Ontario à l’intention des nouveaux arrivants
A project of the Settlement Workers in Schools (SWIS) Program

Le guide des école secondaires de l’Ontario à l’intention des nouveaux arrivants
A project of the Settlement Workers in Schools (SWIS) Program

Newcomers Guide to Graduated Licensing
Produced by Drive Test Ontario

Children’s Aid: Information for Parents
A factsheet produced by CLEO (Community Legal Education Ontario/Éducation juridique communautaire Ontario), 2008. Also available in French, Arabic, Chinese, Somali, Spanish, Tamil, Urdu.

Financial Literacy: Resources for Newcomers to Canada
Produced by Social and Enterprise Development Innovations (SEDI), 2008

Ontario Day to Day – Workbook, Video, Quiz
Produced by Citizenship and Immigration Canada, 2010. Also available in Arabic, Chinese, Farsi, French, Gujarati, Punjabi, Russian, Spanish, Tagalog, Tamil, and Urdu.

Haut de page

ILE DU PRINCE ÉDOUARD

Guide for Newcomers to Prince Edward Island, Canada
An online guide produced by the PEI Association for Newcomers to Canada

Welcome to Prince Edward Island: A guide for newcomers
Produced by PEI Population Secretariat

A Newcomer’s guide to PEI’s School System
Produced by the PEI Association for Newcomers to Canada

Haut de page

SASKATCHEWAN

Saskatchewan Immigration
An immigration portal with orientation topics on living and working as a newcomer in the province.

Haut de page

YUKON

Newcomers Guide
Produced by Carrefour d’immigration Crossroad Yukon, 2008

Haut de page
